TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tjavatjavang, title = Tjavatjavang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tjavatjavang} }

S.FORM: Tjavatjavang Itiniay i Sandimen Cen no Pingtung ko Tjavatjavang a niyaro', 132 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 404 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 393 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan88%, Rukai3%, Bunun1%, Tayal1%, roma3%.

Tjavatjavang Itiniay i Sandimen Cen no Pingtong ko Tjavatjavang a niyaro', 132 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 404 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 393 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan88%, Rokai3%, Bonon1%, Tayal1%, roma3%.
